DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Site Identifier 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Organization or research site participating in a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people._Position in relation to the surroundings._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Organization or research site participating in a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people._Position in relation to the surroundings._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A position in relation to its surroundings.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
